entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 11:51 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.4°C
Wind: SE 31 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to a few showers this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
